participant_1.name: Dr. Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and driven, Emily has a passion for helping others and enjoys spending her free time outdoors.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and upbeat, Jake loves exploring new trails and is always up for a challenge.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i hate the color pink.
